```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(targets)
library(tidymodels)
```


## Model set-up

```{targets mset}
tar_target(
    mset,
    metric_set(rmse)
  )
```

```{targets control}
  tar_target(
    control,
    control_grid(
      save_workflow = TRUE,
      save_pred = TRUE,
      extract = extract_model
    )
  )
```

```{targets controlResamples}
  tar_target(
    controlResamples,
    control_resamples(
      save_workflow = TRUE,
      save_pred = TRUE,
      extract = extract_model
    )
  )
```
